H0.text: What raw material is used for making glass. Quartz

H1.text: What raw material is used for making glass. Silica-rich Rocks

H2.text: What raw material is used for making glass. Feldspar

H3.text: What raw material is used for making glass. Sand

A4.text: Silica sand is the most commonly used sand because of its great abundance, and, thus, low cost.

A5.text: The sand also has the dimensional instability associated with the conversion of quartz from alpha quartz to beta quartz at 680 °C (1250 °F).
